# Class RemoteTTSComponent

Remote TTS (Text-to-Speech) component for audio synthesis services. This component provides access to external text-to-speech services for converting text input into audio output with configurable voice parameters.

#### Example


```
const ttsComponent = new RemoteTTSComponent(&#123;  id: 'my-tts-component',  synthesisConfig: &#123;    voice: 'alloy',    speed: 1.0,    pitch: 1.0  &#125;&#125;);

```


##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

toGraphConfigComponent

Creates a new RemoteTTSComponent instance.

#### Parameters

    * props: RemoteTTSComponentProps

Configuration for the remote TTS component

#### Returns [RemoteTTSComponent]()

Overrides AbstractComponent.constructor




## Methods

### `Protected`toGraphConfigComponent

  * toGraphConfigComponent(): [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component)

Converts the remote TTS component to a graph configuration component.

#### Returns [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component)

The configured remote TTS component for graph execution

Overrides AbstractComponent.toGraphConfigComponent
